channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security 4.2
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security 4.2

item.title: CVE-2023-4958|2024-08-02T07:44:53.761Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20advanced%20cluster%20security%204.2
item.description: In Red Hat Advanced Cluster Security (RHACS), it was found that some security related HTTP headers were missing, allowing an attacker to exploit this with a clickjacking attack. An attacker could exploit this by convincing a valid RHACS user to visit an attacker-controlled web page, that deceptively points to valid RHACS endpoints, hijacking the user's account permissions to perform other actions.
